marklogic.body: Shop Class is the first real test of your ability to exist in this world. Cut something Off and Bleed out, and it's a good thing the state didn't have to spend money on your education for the next six years. Get asthma attacks from the sawdust, well society can support you, but you're going to have to focus on high-level things in order to uphold the infrastructure that makes your continued existence possible. Build a functional canoe, and clearly you can exist independently of society. Feel free to buy a bunch of guns and some property for your future nail-free log cabin.
